title: No children nodes listed when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab.
description: In the data set editor page within the query tab, there seems to be an issue where children nodes are not being listed when changing the data source.
OB: When I attempt to change the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, there are no children nodes listed, even though there should be.
EB: I expected that when I change the data source, the new data source's children should be listed out, allowing me to select them for the data set.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the query tab.
2. Navigate to the data set editor page.
3. Attempt to change the data source for a data set.
4. Observe that no children nodes are listed when the data source is changed.
